DOC.brief_title: Does Concomitant Use Combined Oral Hormonal Steroids Stop Bleeding Women Using Etonogestrel Implants ( Implanon/Nexplanon® ) ? : A Randomized Controlled Study
DOC.detailed_description: The ENG contraceptive implant ( Implanon/Nexplanon® ) , silicone- free , single rod subdermal contraceptive implant contain 68 mg etonogestrel , approve use three year , one effective form contraception available ( 1 ) . ENG contraceptive implant easily insert remove ( 1,2 ) , offer quick return fertility ( 2 ) , cost-effective cost-saving ( 3,4 ) offer non-contraceptive benefit improvement pain patient complaint dysmenorrhea ( 5 ) . Hypothesis : Women use ENG contraceptive implant report bleeding-spotting episode least seven day likely stop bleeding within 3 day begin 14-day course combine oral hormonal steroid compare woman receive 14 day placebo .
